# 2006–07 Karnataka State Film Awards

}}
The Karnataka State Film Awards 2006–07, presented by Government of Karnataka, to felicitate the best of Kannada Cinema released in the year 2006.[http://www.altfg.com/blog/awards/kamataka-state-film-awards-2006-2007/ Karnataka State Film Awards – 2006-2007]
